snippet.title: RATOMON Trailer
snippet.description:
The short game trailer intended to show dungeons, towns, and the world map.


From now on you can play the game in Steam. Please remember that this is a playTEST. I would be grateful if you leave a feedback and, if you like the game, please add it to your wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1586740/RATOMON/





More info:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/justalexi
Telegram: https://t.me/justalexi_games
Website: https://justalexi.com
